events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and all documents are in order.
The application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster based on keywords such as developer and software engineer.
A recruiter has been assigned to handle the candidate's software engineering application for the next steps.
Initial screening was conducted and the candidate showed strong knowledge in software development and coding practices.
The candidate responded positively, confirming availability for technical interviews and expressing great enthusiasm.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate on May 7th, focusing on software engineering and coding challenges.
The candidate completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating solid problem-solving skills and coding ability.
Following the successful technical round, an HR interview has been scheduled to discuss cultural fit and compensation.
The HR interview went well, with the candidate showing great alignment with company values and expectations.
A formal offer has been proposed to the candidate including salary, benefits, and start date details.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed excitement at joining the software engineering team.
The candidate officially accepted the job offer and confirmed the proposed start date for onboarding.
The candidate has started the onboarding process, completing all necessary documentation and introductions.
The recruitment process is complete and the candidate has officially joined the engineering team as a software developer.
